blocks.heading: From Curiosity to Competence in **One Day**
blocks.description:
Large-language models can already shave hours off many knowledge-work tasks, yet most organisations never see those gains on the balance sheet.\
\
Our practical, on-site workshop shows your team how to turn ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini into reliable sidekicks—so the efficiency shows up in KPIs, not just in hallway chatter.

blocks.heading: AI can already cut a 90-minute task to 30. So why don’t company P&Ls reflect that?
blocks.body: AI is already doubling individual output, yet companies report only ‘moderate’ gains. The gap isn’t the tech, it’s the playbook

cards.heading: Slows work
cards.description: Treating AI like a search box means lots of re-typing.

cards.heading: Creates errors
cards.description: Models hallucinate; people accept the answer.

cards.heading: Wastes licences
cards.description: You pay for tools that deliver half the value.

blocks.heading: What We Cover
blocks.body: A Practical Crash-Course Grounded in Research

accordionItems.label: How LLMs Think
accordionItems.content: Tokens, context, randomness—explained in plain English so the next answer feels less like magic.

accordionItems.label: Choosing the Right Model
accordionItems.content: When to pick ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini, and why it matters.

accordionItems.label: Prompt Patterns That Work
accordionItems.content: Role prompts, chain-of-thought, retrieval tricks. Tested with hundreds of managers and devs.

accordionItems.label: Real-World Projects
accordionItems.content:
Synthesise web research into a briefing note. 

Analyse a messy spreadsheet in minutes. 

Draft clean code plus unit tests.

blocks.heading: Uly
blocks.description: Lecturer, ex-Microsoft engineer, author of LLMs at Work. Has trained 2,300 professionals across six industries.

features.heading: Report writing went from three hours to 5 minutes. Worth every cent.

blocks.heading: Tech wisdom from the trenches
blocks.body: At SSW, we’ve been knee-deep in AI projects for years: debugging giant solutions, fixing game-stopping bugs, and staying on the cutting edge. No guesswork—just proven tips that help you build better software.

cards.heading: Lorem Ipsum
cards.description: SSW’s Gert Marx reconnects with Chris Simon at NDC Melbourne to dive into the latest updates on Contextive, the powerful open-source tool helping developers write better, more business-aligned code.
